name: DENTAL_FIND_HIST_SURF_RM
description: This table extracts the related multiple response item for historical surfaces.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: DEN_SURF_STAT_HIS_C_NAME
columns.description: This column keeps track of status of dental surfaces over time.
